name: Furina
title: "Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina
desc: Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

talent_card.name: "Hear Me â€” Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Soloist's Solicitation
skills.desc:
Deals 2 Physical DMG.
Once per Round: If you do not have Seats Sacred and Secular in your Hand, create 1 Seats Sacred and Secular card in your Hand.

skills.name: Salon Solitaire
skills.desc:
Furina is currently in the Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons Salon Members.
(When Furina is in the Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon Singer of Many Waters instead)

skills.name: Let the People Rejoice
skills.desc: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, creates 1 Universal Revelry.

skills.name: Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular
skills.desc: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 Seats Sacred and Secular card in your Hand.
